'''Beta 1.21.110.26''' (ChromeOS, Android) or '''Preview 1.21.110.26''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox, PlayStation) is the sixth and final beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.111]]{{note|1.21.110 is not a version of the game and its betas are instead part of 1.21.111.|name=1.21.111}}, released on August 26, 2025,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/39096111326605-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-110-26|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.110.26|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=August 26, 2025}}</ref> which fixes some bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Settings]]'''
* Added an option (called "Hide Sky Flashes") to hide [[End flash]]es when playing with [[Vibrant Visuals]].

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.110.26 Preview
|;old
|223753|Copper golem is spawned in the air when built sideways.
|223754|Copper golem loses oxidation level when built sideways.
|;dev
|225194|Non-full blocks can be put on shelves.
|otherissuescount=1}}
'''Other'''
*Fixed a crash when downloading packs from a multiplayer world on Xbox.</onlyinclude>
